Customers Service API Documentation

This document provides an overview of the Customers Service API.

Classes and Methods

RegisterCustomer Class

The RegisterCustomer class handles the registration of new customers.

UpdateCustomer Class

The UpdateCustomer class handles updating customer details.

DeleteCustomer Class

The DeleteCustomer class handles deleting a customer.

GetCustomers Class

The GetCustomers class handles retrieving all customer details.

WalletOperation Class

The WalletOperation class handles the operations related to updating the customer’s wallet balance.

GetCustomerByUsername Class

The GetCustomerByUsername class handles fetching customer details by their username.
